verses.verse: Then <WG5119> there come<WG4334> to Jesus<WG2424> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414> Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122>, saying<WG3004>,

Why <WG5101> do<WG3845> thy<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> transgress<WG3845> the tradition<WG3862> of the elders<WG4245>? for<WG1063> they wash<WG3538> not<WG3756> their<WG846> hands<WG5495> when<WG3752> they eat<WG2068> bread<WG740>.

And <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> do<WG3845> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> transgress<WG3845> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> because<WG1223> of your<WG5216> tradition<WG3862>?

For <WG1063> God<WG2316> said<WG1781>, Honor<WG5091> thy<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> mother<WG3384>: and<WG2532>, He that speaketh evil<WG2551> of father<WG3962> or<WG2228> mother<WG3384>, let him die<WG5053> the death<WG2288>.

But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> say<WG3004>, whosoever<WG3739> shall<WG302> say<WG2036> to<WG3962> his father<WG3962> or<WG2228> his mother<WG3384>, That<WG3739> wherewith<WG3739> thou mightest have been profited<WG5623> by<WG1537> me<WG1700> is given to God<WG1435>;
he shall<WG3361> not<WG3756> honor<WG5091> his<WG846> father<WG3962>. And<WG2532> ye have made void<WG208> the word of God<WG2316> because of<WG1223> your<WG5216> tradition<WG3862>.
Ye hypocrites<WG5273>, well<WG2573> did<WG4395> Isaiah<WG2268> prophesy<WG4395> of<WG4012> you<WG5216>, saying<WG3004>,
This <WG3778> people<WG2992> honoreth<WG5091> me<WG3427> with<WG4750> their<WG846> lips<WG4750>; But<WG1161> their<WG846> heart<WG2588> is<WG568> far<WG4206> from<WG575> me<WG1700>.
But <WG1161> in vain<WG3155> do they worship<WG4576> me<WG3165>, Teaching<WG1321> as their doctrines<WG1319> the precepts<WG1778> of men<WG444>.
And <WG2532> he called<WG4341> to him the multitude<WG3793>, and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> understand<WG4920>:

Not <WG3756> that which entereth<WG1525> into<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> defileth<WG2840> the man<WG444>; but<WG235> that which proceedeth out<WG1607> of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750>, this<WG5124> defileth<WG2840> the man<WG444>.

Then <WG5119> came<WG4334> the<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Knowest thou<WG1492> that<WG3754> the Pharisees<WG5330> were offended<WG4624>, when they heard<WG191> this saying<WG3056>?
But <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, Every<WG3956> plant<WG5451> which<WG3739> my<WG3450> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> planted<WG5452> not<WG3756>, shall be rooted up<WG1610>.

Let <WG863> them<WG846> alone<WG863>: they are<WG1526> blind<WG5185> guides<WG3595>. And<WG1161> if<WG1437> the blind<WG5185> guide<WG3594> the blind<WG5185>, both<WG297> shall fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> a pit<WG999>.
And <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Declare<WG5419> unto us<WG2254> the<WG3778> parable<WG3850>.
And <WG1161> he<WG2424> said<WG2036>, Are<WG2075> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> even yet<WG188> without understanding<WG801>?

Perceive <WG3539> ye<WG3539> not<WG3768>, that<WG3754> whatsoever<WG3956> goeth<WG1531> into the<WG1519> mouth<WG4750> passeth<WG5562> into<WG1519> the belly<WG2836>, and<WG2532> is cast out<WG1544> into<WG1519> the draught<WG856>?
But <WG1161> the things which proceed<WG1607> out<WG1537> of the mouth<WG4750> come forth<WG1831> out<WG1537> of the heart<WG2588>; and they<WG2548> defile<WG2840> the man<WG444>.

For <WG1063> out<WG1537> of the heart<WG2588> come<WG1831> forth evil<WG4190> thoughts<WG1261>, murders<WG5408>, adulteries<WG3430>, fornications<WG4202>, thefts<WG2829>, false witness<WG5577>, railings<WG988>:
these <WG5023> are<WG2076> the things which defile<WG2840> the man<WG444>; but<WG1161> to eat<WG5315> with<WG5495> unwashen<WG449> hands<WG5495> defileth<WG2840> not<WG3756> the man<WG444>.
And Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> out<WG402> thence<WG1564>, and<WG2532> withdrew<WG402> into<WG1519> the parts of Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605>.

And <WG2532> behold<WG2400>, a Canaanitish<WG5478> woman<WG1135> came<WG1831> out<WG575> from<WG3725> those<WG1565> borders<WG3725>, and cried<WG2905>, saying<WG3004>, Have mercy<WG1653> on me<WG3165>, O Lord<WG2962>, thou son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>; my<WG3450> daughter<WG2364> is<WG1139> grievously<WG2560> vexed with a demon<WG1139>.

But <WG1161> he answered<WG611> her<WG846> not<WG3756> a word<WG3056>. And<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> and besought<WG2065> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Send<WG630> her<WG846> away<WG630>; for<WG3754> she crieth<WG2896> after<WG3693> us<WG2257>.
But <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, I<WG649> was<WG649> not<WG3756> sent<WG649> but<WG3361> unto<WG1519> the lost<WG622> sheep<WG4263> of the house<WG3624> of Israel<WG2474>.
But <WG1161> she<WG2064> came and worshipped<WG4352> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, help<WG997> me<WG3427>.
And <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, It is<WG2076> not<WG3756> meet<WG2570> to take<WG2983> the children<WG5043>'s bread<WG740> and<WG2532> cast<WG906> it to the dogs<WG2952>.

But <WG1161> she said<WG2036>, Yea<WG3483>, Lord<WG2532>: for<WG1063> even the dogs<WG2952> eat<WG2068> of<WG575> the crumbs<WG5589> which fall<WG4098> from<WG575> their<WG846> masters<WG2962>' table<WG5132>.

Then <WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto her<WG846>, O<WG5599> woman<WG1135>, great<WG3173> is thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102>: be it<WG1096> done unto thee<WG4671> even as<WG5613> thou wilt<WG2309>. And<WG2532> her<WG846> daughter<WG2364> was healed<WG2390> from<WG575> that<WG1565> hour<WG5610>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> departed<WG3327> thence<WG1564>, and came<WG2064> nigh<WG3844> unto the sea<WG2281> of Galilee<WG1056>; and<WG2532> he went up<WG305> into<WG1519> the mountain<WG3735>, and<WG2532> sat there<WG1563>.

And <WG2532> there came unto<WG4334> him<WG846> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793>, having<WG2192> with<WG3326> them<WG1438> the lame<WG5560>, blind<WG5185>, dumb<WG2974>, maimed<WG2948>, and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others<WG2087>, and<WG2532> they cast<WG4496> them<WG846> down<WG4496> at<WG3844> his<WG2424> feet<WG4228>; and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> them<WG846>:

insomuch that<WG5620> the multitude<WG3793> wondered<WG2296>, when they saw<WG991> the dumb<WG2974> speaking<WG2980>, the maimed<WG2948> whole<WG5199>, and lame<WG5560> walking<WG4043>, and<WG2532> the blind<WG5185> seeing<WG991>: and<WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> the God<WG2316> of Israel<WG2474>.

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> unto him his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036>, I have compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude<WG3793>, because<WG3754> they continue with<WG4357> me<WG3427> now<WG2235> three<WG5140> days<WG2250> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> nothing<WG3756> to<WG5101> eat<WG5315>: and<WG2532> I would<WG2309> not<WG3756> send<WG630> them<WG846> away<WG630> fasting<WG3523>, lest<WG3379> haply they faint<WG1590> on<WG1722> the way<WG3598>.

And <WG2532> the<WG846> disciples<WG3101> say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Whence<WG4159> should we have<WG2254> so many<WG5118> loaves<WG740> in<WG1722> a desert<WG2047> place as<WG5620> to fill<WG5526> so great<WG5118> a multitude<WG3793>?
And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, How many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have ye<WG2192>? And<WG1161> they said<WG2036>, Seven<WG2033>, and<WG2532> a few<WG3641> small fishes<WG2485>.
And <WG2532> he commanded<WG2753> the multitude<WG3793> to sit down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground<WG1093>;

and <WG2532> he took<WG2983> the<WG740> seven<WG2033> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> the fishes<WG2486>; and he gave thanks<WG2168> and brake<WG2806>, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> to<WG3101> the<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and<WG1161> the disciples<WG3101> to the multitudes<WG3793>.

And <WG2532> they all<WG3956> ate<WG5315>, and<WG2532> were filled<WG5526>: and<WG2532> they took up<WG142> that which remained<WG4052> over of the broken<WG2801> pieces<WG2033>, seven baskets<WG4711> full<WG4134>.
And <WG1161> they that did eat<WG2068> were<WG2258> four thousand<WG5070> men<WG435>, besides<WG5565> women<WG1135> and<WG2532> children<WG3813>.
And <WG2532> he sent away<WG630> the multitudes<WG3793>, and entered<WG1684> into<WG1519> the boat<WG4143>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the borders<WG3725> of Magadan<WG3093>.
